snippet: The Giants defensive end has not played since last season after injuring his hand in a fireworks accident.
abstract: Jason Pierre-Paul, who has not been on active roster for New York Giants since last season, is nearly certain to play against upcoming game with Tampa Bay Buccaneers.
lead_paragraph: The Giants defensive end has not played since last season after injuring his hand in a fireworks accident.

headline.main: Jason Pierre-Paul Likely to Play vs. Buccaneers
headline.print_headline: Pierre-Paul Likely to Play vs. Buccaneers
